game.instructions: Queen Narissa is trying to tempt Princess Giselle with some special apples—some poisonous, some not. Use the arrow keys to help Pip protect Giselle and collect all of the red and golden apples. Watch out for obstacles and the poison apples—they will lower your life level. Good luck, and hurry!
game.congrats: Congratulations! you have earned a high score. Please enter your name below.

gameOver.gameComplete:
Congratulations!
You have gathered up many apples and have saved Giselle from harm.
Send this game to a friend and see if they beat your score!
gameOver.gameLost: So sorry! You must try again. Help save Giselle before it’s too late!

level.brief:
Good apples are red
Good apples are green
Watch out for the brown ones because they are mean!
Remember to avoid the bunnies and leap over Prince Edward’s sword!
I hear there is a dragon around these parts, so be careful!
Almost there! Be swift, as this level is a challenge!
